name: Air Elemental
lore: Air elementals are living vortices of wind drawn from the Elemental Plane of Air. They sweep through the skies and across open ground with devastating speed. In combat they batter foes with powerful gusts and can draw enemies into their whirling forms.

traits.name: Air Form
traits.description: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

multiattack.description: The elemental makes two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 5 ft. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Whirlwind
actions.description: Each creature in the elemental's space makes a DC 13 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 15 (3d8 + 2) Bludgeoning damage and is flung up to 20 feet in a random direction and has the Prone condition. If a flung target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 (1d6) Bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was flung. If the target is flung at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and have the Prone condition. On a successful save, a target takes half damage only.

savingThrow.targets: each creature in the elemental's space

onFailure.effects: The target is flung up to 20 feet in a random direction. If the flung target strikes a solid surface, it takes 3 (1d6) Bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was flung. If flung at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and have the Prone condition.
